channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Sonar Gerrit Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Sonar Gerrit Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-46688|2024-08-03T14:39:38.622Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sonar%20gerrit%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Sonar Gerrit Plugin 377.v8f3808963dc5 and earlier allows attackers to have Jenkins connect to Gerrit servers (previously configured by Jenkins administrators) using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, potentially capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
